dt-api.name: searchPanes.repopulatePane()
dt-api.summary: Repopulate the pane without rebuilding all of the HTML elements.

type.description: Repopulate the pane without rebuilding all of the HTML elements.

dt-api.description:
This method preovides the ability to repopulate the panes should a change occur on the associated DataTable. As the method purely repopulates the pane, it has no need for a return.
`-init searchPanes.repopulatePane()` must take a single integer as an argument. It does not allow for all of the panes to be repopulated using a single command.
